OfferResource.title: Offer Resource
OfferResource.description: Offer details including warehouse and product information

discount_percentage.description: The discount percentage of the offer

start_date.description: The start date of the offer

end_date.description: The end date of the offer

amount.description: The amount of the product in the warehouse

expiry_date.description: The expiry date of the warehouse stock

description.example: A high-end smartphone with excellent features and a sleek design.

current_price.description: The current price of the product after discounts

views.description: The number of views of the product

likes.description: The number of likes of the product

dislikes.description: The number of dislikes of the product

total_amount.description: The total amount of product available

ending_at.description: The end date of the best offer

comments.description: The number of comments on the product

average_rating.description: The average rating of the product
